name: A Fox Game
description:
prototype pitch:

A Fox Life is a classic styled platformer for PC that lets the player take the role of a fox. The casual nature of the game is fit for people all ages who want to learn what it’s like to live the ruff life. Avoid traps, barbed wire fences, and natural predators as you make your way through the farmlands to eat as many chicks as possible! Use your sly wits to find keys to the next locations and make a living as a fox in this cute and exciting tale.

how to play:
  • Movement - L/R Arrow Keys
    • Jump - UP Arrow Key
  • Restart game - ESC
